Package agh.alleviation.service

Class UserService

java.lang.Object
agh.alleviation.service.EntityObjectService<User,​UserRepository>
agh.alleviation.service.UserService
@Service
public class UserService
extends EntityObjectService<User,​UserRepository>
Service responsible for manipulating the user repository.
Author:
Anna Nosek
See Also:
User, UserRepository

  • Method Details

    • setUserType

      private User setUserType​(User user)
      This function updates the userType in the user according to its concrete class. UserType would be obsolete in the database, so it is only assigned when the User instance is accessed in the application.
      Parameters:
      user - user from the database
      Returns:
      user with updated UserType field
      See Also:
      User

    • delete

      public java.util.List<EntityObject> delete​(EntityObject user)
      Overrides method to get orders associated with user if user is customer Because of lazy loading, they are not loaded at the object creation.
      Overrides:
      delete in class EntityObjectService<User,​UserRepository>
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      list of entity objects deleted with user
